pages.text: A strange noise, a peculiar message, and a giant beam of light from the sky...$(p)All signs point to a Boss, actively invading your world.

As opposed to bosses that are found in dungeons, invading bosses may rarely show up on the surface where mobs can normally spawn.$(p)Their arrival will be marked by a loud noise, a status message, and a beacon that briefly emanates from their spawn point.
